"Free Exploration: Sanctum":
"This is an mission that acts as an
application for free access to the
dragon altar area on the planet Amduscia.

By clearing a difficult mission, you show
that you have enough ability to handle
being deployed independently.
※Clear [Subdue Sol Dirandal] in 25 mins
and [Subdue Goronzoran] in 35 mins.
※Data drops from Lv.28+ Dragonkin."
